payment_detail: Pay with Mada, Visa/Mater Card and Apple pay for a secure & hands free deals, or choose cash on delivery option.
Location_Detail:
Please select your site location. This location will be used to show the services & delivering your items.
You can edit this location at any time.
Learn_More_Detail:
We can detect your location by turning on the location service on your phone by clicking YES.If you clicked NO, you will select your location manually.

We need a drop-off location to show our services at that particular location.Also, you can change it any time from the home page and from check out page.
locationUse?:
This app wants to change your device settings.
Please turn on device location to proceed.
